verses.roman:
hṛdaye dharimu tomāra kamala caraṇa
nayane dekhimu tomāra cāṅda vadana

synonyms: hṛdaye—upon my heart; dharimu—I shall catch; tomāra—Your; kamala caraṇa—lotuslike feet; nayane—with my eyes; dekhimu—I shall see; tomāra—Your; cāṅda vadana—face like the moon.
translation: "I wish to catch Your lotuslike feet upon my heart and see Your moonlike face.
